statements: UPDATE donors SET donation_amount = 500 WHERE donor_name = 'Alice';
UPDATE donors SET donation_date = '2022-12-31', donation_amount = 1000 WHERE donor_id = 2;
UPDATE donors SET donation_amount = 1000.50, donation_date = '2022-10-15' WHERE donor_id = 1;
UPDATE donors SET donor_name = 'Alice Doe', donation_amount = 500.75 WHERE donation_date = '2023-05-20';
UPDATE donors SET email='john.doe@example.com' WHERE donor_id=1;
UPDATE contributions SET amount=500.00 WHERE contribution_id=10;
UPDATE donors SET phone_number = '+1-123-456-7890' WHERE donor_id = 1001;
UPDATE contributions SET amount = 5000.00, contribution_date = '2022-12-31' WHERE donor_id = (SELECT donor_id FROM donors WHERE email = 'john.doe@example.com');
UPDATE donors SET email='john.doe@example.com' WHERE donor_id=1;
UPDATE contributions SET amount=5000.00, date_contributed='2022-10-15' WHERE contribution_id=3;
UPDATE donors SET email='john.doe@example.com', phone_number='+1234567890' WHERE donor_id=1;
UPDATE contributions SET amount=500.00, date_contributed='2023-06-15' WHERE contribution_id=2;
UPDATE donors SET donor_name='John Doe', donor_email='john.doe@example.com' WHERE donor_id=1;
UPDATE projects SET project_name='New Project Name', project_status='Active' WHERE project_id=2;
UPDATE donors SET donor_name = 'John Doe', donor_email = 'john.doe@example.com' WHERE donor_id = 1;
UPDATE projects SET project_status = 'Completed', project_description = 'Project successfully completed' WHERE project_id = 3;
UPDATE donors SET first_name='John', last_name='Doe' WHERE donor_id=1;
UPDATE donations SET amount=500.00 WHERE donation_id=2;
UPDATE donors SET first_name = 'John', last_name = 'Doe', email = 'john.doe@example.com' WHERE donor_id = 1;
UPDATE donations_campaigns SET campaign_id = 2 WHERE donation_id = 3;
